QuestData.Title: Broken Dreams
QuestData.Description: Yes, I found the Stormstout Brewery... although I didn't exactly get the warm reception I expected.$b$b<Chen pours himself a mug of ale.>$b$bDo you want to hear the story?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Chen Stormstout and listen to his story.
QuestData.RewardText: Maybe I wasn't meant to settle down anyhow.
